issue.title: [Dev] Add infrastructure for testing Git interactions in merge_arrow_pr.py
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16050](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16050). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, there are no tests in 'test_merge_arrow_pr.py' for functions in 'merge_arrow_pr.py' that require interaction with Git. 

Adding infrastructure to allow interactions with a test Git repository or mocked environment will allow 'test_merge_arrow_pr.py' to qualify steps that use Git commands.
